title: Sweet Wine Recommendations by Category

items.name: Jam Jar Sweet Shiraz
items.details: Truly sweet with jammy berry flavor. Blue label with white cap.

items.name: Apothic Red / Apothic Crush
items.details: Off-dry with a smooth, slightly sweet finish. Not fully sweet but approachable.

items.name: Stella Rosa (all varieties)
items.details: Sweet and lightly fizzy dessert-style wines. Available in black, red, peach, berry, and tropical.

items.name: Riunite Lambrusco
items.details: Sweet, slightly sparkling red. Best served chilled for easy drinking.

items.name: Barefoot Moscato / Pink Moscato / Red Moscato
Relax Riesling
items.details: Medium-sweet, crisp, and floral. Good balance without being syrupy.

items.name: Roscato Rosso Dolce
items.details: Smooth, sweet red with a bit of fizz. Very popular sweet red option.

notes: For unmistakably sweet wines, go with Stella Rosa or Barefoot Moscato. For sweet but more balanced options, try Relax Riesling or Roscato. Most standard reds (Decoy, Josh, Coppola, Meiomi) are dry, not sweet.
